reporter_caption.center: KIRBY v. ZONING BOARD OF THE TOWN OF MIDDLETOWN, 117 R.I. 948 (1976)

caption.center: JEROME R. KIRBY, JR. et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF THE TOWN OF MIDDLETOWN.

opinion.posture: Petition for certiorari is granted and the writ shall issue forthwith.
opinion.attorneys:
Corcoran, Peckham Hayes, William W. Corcoran, for petitioners.
Moore, Virgadamo, Boyle Lynch, Ltd., Salvatore L.Virgadamo, for Bay Broadcasters, Inc., et al.; Joseph B.Going for members of the Zoning Board of Review, respondents.
